spec_data.Name: perl-HTTP-Thin
spec_data.Description:
HTTP::Thin is a thin wrapper around HTTP::Tiny adding the ability to pass
in HTTP::Request objects and get back HTTP::Response objects.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:22:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Thin Wrapper around HTTP::Tiny to play nice with HTTP::Message
